item.title: Previous work built using Unity3D
item.description: In this page is a selection of games that I worked in as personal projects or university assignments. Convicted Your browser does not support the video tag. 3D reimagining of Space Invaders as a first-person shooter where you fly a robot in space and destroy aliens using a laser weapon. Made in 2018 as a group class assignment. Developed for Windows, download link . Okan Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: ❯ whoami
item.description: Hi, my name is Vinicius1 I am a programmer and game designer based off Salvador, Bahia. I’m studying game development as an undergrad at the State University of Bahia and my main research interests lie at the intersection between game and web technologies. Unity3D is my weapon of choice and C# is my main programming language, but I also know little bit of golang, Node.js, and Docker. I am also disabled.
